flavorText: An infinite journey in an infinitesimal time.

foreignData.flavorText: Eine unendlich lange Reise in unendlich kurzer Zeit.
foreignData.name: Aufflackern des Schicksals
foreignData.text: Schicke eine Kreatur oder eine Verzauberung deiner Wahl ins Exil und bringe sie dann unter der Kontrolle ihres Besitzers ins Spiel zurück.

foreignData.flavorText: Un viaje infinito en un tiempo infinitesimal.
foreignData.name: Instante del destino
foreignData.text: Exilia la criatura o encantamiento objetivo, luego regrésalo al campo de batalla bajo el control de su propietario.

foreignData.flavorText: Un voyage infini d'une durée infinitésimale.
foreignData.name: Vacillement du destin
foreignData.text: Exilez une créature ciblée ou un enchantement ciblé, puis renvoyez-le sur le champ de bataille sous le contrôle de son propriétaire.

foreignData.flavorText: Un viaggio infinito in un lasso di tempo infinitesimale.
foreignData.name: Fremito del Fato
foreignData.text: Esilia una creatura o un incantesimo bersaglio, poi rimetti quel permanente sul campo di battaglia sotto il controllo del suo proprietario.

foreignData.flavorText: 無限の旅に出る無限小の時間。
foreignData.name: 運命のちらつき
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体かエンチャント１つを対象とし、それを追放する。その後、それをオーナーのコントロール下で戦場に戻す。

foreignData.name: 운명의 깜빡임
foreignData.text: 생물 또는 부여마법을 목표로 정한다. 그 목표를 추방한 후, 소유자의 조종하에 전장으로 되돌린다.

foreignData.flavorText: Uma jornada infinita em tempo infinitesimal.
foreignData.name: Bruxuleio do Destino
foreignData.text: Exile a criatura ou o encantamento alvo e, depois, devolva-a ao campo de batalha sob o controle de seu dono.

foreignData.flavorText: Бесконечно долгое путешествие за бесконечно малое время.
foreignData.name: Проблеск Судьбы
foreignData.text: Изгоните целевое существо или чары, затем верните его (их) на поле битвы под контролем его (их) владельца.

foreignData.flavorText: 无穷短时间内的一次无限长旅行。
foreignData.name: 明灭命运
foreignData.text: 放逐目标生物或结界，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

foreignData.flavorText: 無窮短時間內的一次無限長旅行。
foreignData.name: 明滅命運
foreignData.text: 放逐目標生物或結界，然後將它在其擁有者的操控下移回戰場。

name: Flicker of Fate
originalText: Exile target creature or enchantment, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

rulings.text: Once the exiled permanent returns, it’s considered a new object with no relation to the object that it was. Auras attached to the exiled permanent will be put into their owners’ graveyards. Equipment attached to the exiled permanent will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled permanent will cease to exist.
If a token is exiled this way, it will cease to exist and won’t return to the battlefield.

If an Aura is put onto the battlefield without being cast, the Aura’s controller-to-be chooses what it will enchant as it comes back onto the battlefield. An Aura put onto the battlefield this way doesn’t target anything (so it could be attached to an opponent’s permanent with hexproof, for example), but the Aura’s enchant ability restricts what it can be attached to. If the Aura can’t legally be attached to anything, it remains in its current zone.

text: Exile target creature or enchantment, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
